sense.def: Illness Sign of desiccated, withered hair. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 13: 頭乾瘰癧，頭髮黃聳分去，或乍痢 乍瘥，諸狀既多，不可備說，大黃煎丸方 , “For desiccated head and scrofula with pervasion-illness, when the hair turns yellow and is partially lost, in some cases with sudden free-flux illness and sudden remission, and so many signs, it is impossible to name them all, [use] the recipe for the pills with boiled da huang ”.
